name: Chain of Heroes
description:
A new generation of heroes arrives

Play through a big mystic adventure

with unique levels. Choose from two

powerful characters, each with

their own awesome magic spells.

All mixed with exciting gameplay.

Switch characters

You can switch between Mitzu and

Theezus at any time. Mitzu is fast

and can create portals to teleport.

Theezus is a powerful magician

with lots of different magic spells

which are powerful and fun to use.
